title: Bluetooth keeps stopping pixel 3 Xl
content:
Just got a refurbished Pixel 3XL from Asurion on Verizon.

Bluetooth and WiFi worked fine for a day or so until I, assume an update got installed. I've tried everything except a factory reset, I've googled for hours and tried everything.

Turning off BT scanning stops the error message but WiFi and Bluetooth are unusable.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
